TopicTitle: How do I access the debug menu?

Articles.Content: If you've read the title you should tell me your answer.

Moved to Gameplay question as this thread is more relevant in that portion of the forum.

 

To access the debug menu, you have to press the key ALT and F12 at the same time.

On Linux it's Right Shift + F12 in case that's what you're running.

Edited October 6, 2017 by Geonovast

29 minutes ago, goldenpeach said:

Moved to Gameplay question as this thread is more relevant in that portion of the forum.

 

To access the debug menu, you have to press the key ALT and F12 at the same time.

[ALT GR]+[F12]   at least that's what do it for me.

Simply press ALT + F12. It brings up everything from cheating (infinite fuel, unbreakable joints), to messing with gravity, and the Whack-A-Kerbal (a thing where you can shoot shapes at stuff to destroy them).
If that doesnt work try Ctrl+Alt+F12. Some Application changed it to that on my computer a while back
Geforce also has a keybinding with F12 that overwrites KSP's. When the Alt-F12 doesn't work, go to Geforce Experience and change the keybinding.
This thread was helpful to me (2 years later) because I totally forgot this key command after not playing for almost 6 months. Thank you!

On 10/6/2017 at 2:29 AM, DrLicor said:

Geforce also has a keybinding with F12 that overwrites KSP's. When the Alt-F12 doesn't work, go to Geforce Experience and change the keybinding.    

This worked PERFECTLY. As more and more computers use GeForce it cannot be stressed enough that GeForce is the reason why Alt-F12 does not work on some machines. Go into GeForce Experience, then into the settings, then into keybinds, and the one for FPS should be changed from Alt-F12 to something else.
